import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update tags by IDs"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tags/ids/update"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates multiple tags by TagId in a single request, applying per-tag changes in the request body array.

**Prerequisites**
1. **TagId list** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/tags/query](/docs/api/tags/get-tags-by-query) or [GET /api/v1.0/tags/of/type/\{tagTypeId\}](/docs/api/tags/get-tags-by-type) to locate tags and extract `Items[].TagId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Gather TagId values to update.
2. Submit [PUT /api/v1.0/tags/ids/update](/docs/api/tags/update-tags-by-ids) with one object per tag including the TagId and new values.

**Minimal Required Fields**: TagId, Name, TagTypeId (per item)

**Note**: This API is deprecated.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","description":"List of tag updates with TagId specified in each object","items":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for creating or updating a tag.","properties":{"TagId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the tag. Required for updates, generated on create if not provided."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name for the tag"},"TagTypeId":{"type":"integer","description":"Type identifier for the tag (e.g., asset tag, ticket tag)"},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Site scope for the tag. Null for district-wide tags."},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Product association for the tag"},"ScopeId":{"type":"string","description":"Scope identifier for the tag"}},"required":["Name","TagTypeId"],"title":"UpdateTagRequest"}},"example":[{"TagId":"a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890","Name":"Updated Tag 1","TagTypeId":1},{"TagId":"b2c3d4e5-f6a7-8901-bcde-f12345678901","Name":"Updated Tag 2","TagTypeId":2}]}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Tags updated successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response envelope returned after successfully updating multiple resources in bulk. >
